item.title: Marriage Mini Series Q&A [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description: The Rebels answer some listener questions about their marriage mini series.  If these answers prompt more questions, send them in.  There's no limit to how many questions they will answer!
item.author: Pastors Nate & Chris - The Rebels
item.itunes:author: Pastors Nate & Chris - The Rebels

item.title: Marriage Mini-Series: Whatâ€™s the Foundation [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description:
With so many new families in the church and the consistent teaching that the Family of Families, the Household of God, the local church,  is only ever as strong as the individual families that comprise it P Nate and Chris continue their mini series discussing marriage. At the centre of every family is the relationship between a husband and wife, so lets take some time to help families prioritize, restore and grow strong biblical marriages.

In this third episode the Rebels direct the attention to the bedroom, where intimacy and Godly affection and character are cultivated

*Note to parents: due to the nature of the topic of this episode, perhaps this isn’t the best episode tp play while the kids are around..
item.author: Pastors Nate & Chris - The Rebels
item.itunes:author: Pastors Nate & Chris - The Rebels
